creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
description: From a suite of four etchings depicting four distinct phases in the life cycle of the periodical cicada. The two intersecting lines dividing the image into four quadrants allude to the \"four corners\" are of the Southwestern United States, where Utah, Colorado, Arizon, and New Mexico meet and where the artist first encountered her subject.
marks:
Signed, Dated, Numbered, and Chop Mark LR: [Nancy Randall - 80]
LL: [A.P. 3/6]
LL: VEL
title: The Four Corners, Plate IV
